there were 2 other sightings in cms\tg n\a on or around january 14th 2008
divs: sighting detailsicame out from the baseball batting cages here in burleson w\my 9 year old son. got in the truck. we began pulling out of parking spot and as i looked in sky to side of his window i saw a brilliant yellow lite like a star getting closer to earth. i yelled at him to turn and look, look at it. it came faster and got faster very quickly. then left a trail of several little yellow brilliant lights. it then appeared to just stop and i assumed maybe it burned out as falling stars may. i've checked the weather.gov and they don't show any falling stars or metorites. my son didn't look fast enough to see this out his window. i don't have photos and figured it was a star so didnt report it but now that tx seems to have a rash of people seeing things i thought it best. perhaps others have seen this at night too and will now come forward or have already done so. this may help back up their stories.
Summary: Very bright object in sky. Yellow brilliant color
